description:
She is one the weaver sisters who resided in the weaving shed near Konohanatei as well as one of the guests. http://anidb.net/ch92139 [Okiku] and http://anidb.net/ch90639 [Yuzu] were supposed to bring her lunch only to find out that she didn`t finish her breakfast yet.
Her attitude towards the two was cold at first, but after several tries, girl finally told them what was wrong. She mentioned that her older sister is the fastest among them, while her younger sister makes the finest fabric. Unfortunately for her, she is somewhere in the middle and her wish is that one day she`ll be best among them.
name: Hataori no Shoujo
